snippet: The company highlighted digital growth in the fourth quarter but said revenue was flat because of its declining print business.
abstract: New York Times announces sweeping overhaul of its newsroom, which will include pinpointing further areas for cost cuts; reports fourth-quarter income of $52 million, up 48 percent from year-ago quarter; revenue was flat at $445 million.
lead_paragraph: The company highlighted digital growth in the fourth quarter but said revenue was flat because of its declining print business.

headline.main: New York Times Co. Announces Newsroomwide Strategy Review
headline.print_headline: New York Times Announces Sweeping Strategy Review Across Newsroom
